channel.title: Help for rep+++++++++++++++
channel.description:
So, i've done how to run the Matrix source (omg that was hard L0L0L) for my video.
But, i still have some questions
What are the moderators commands and Admin commands?
I want this so badly because i dont know how to give support rank, and donator/extr donator rank, wich is needed for my video, and i really want to know the commands.
If you now any command, post is please like this:
Moderator - ::(command) - (info)
Thanks, i will rep++ who helps me.

item.title: Help for rep+++++++++++++++
item.dc:creator: @Kastro1 Kastro_
item.description:
@Kastro1 wrote:

I think Matrix is a 723.

Read full topic

item.title: Help for rep+++++++++++++++
item.dc:creator: @fier12 fier12
item.description:
@fier12 wrote:

i know your question is alredy answered but what is you server revision?

Read full topic

item.title: Help for rep+++++++++++++++
item.dc:creator: @Kastro1 Kastro_
item.description:
@Kastro1 wrote:

The commands are already built in for Moderator and Admin Dev. To give moderator to someone in-game simple type the command ::givemod and same with admin so it’ll be ::giveadmin

Read full topic

item.title: Help for rep+++++++++++++++
item.dc:creator: @ruud123 ruud123
item.description:
@ruud123 wrote:

goto your source then open the map src\com\rs\game\player\content
and in the map content there you will find commands.java and look in it for all the commands

Read full topic

item.title: Help for rep+++++++++++++++
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

You can’t rep. And check your commands class and you can find your commands there.

Read full topic
